name: Juanitus Tempus Jumper
description:
Overview:

Juanitus Tempus Jumper is a vertical slice of a Roguelite Bullet-Hell.

You are Juanitus, a normal guy but with the ability to change the season of the year, altering the map and gameplay.


Features:
  • Semi randomized level with 20 different chambers
  • Change seasons, altering the gameplay
  • 3 different weapons
  • 5 enemies with unique attacks
  • Abilities/skills
  • 2 bosses
  • (meme) Support for 6 languages
Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Dash
  • LMB - Shoot
  • MW - Change weapon
  • R - Reload
  • TAB - Change season
  • E - Buy
  • Q - Ability 1
  • F - Ability 2
Credits:

Programming - Tomas Fernandez

Game & Level design || Producer - Francisco Roldan (me :D)

Pixel art || Animations || Additional game design - Francisco Casado

Intro scene - Candela Formigo

Special thanks to:

-Nicolas Magno (best professor ever)

-Augusto Velasco (script writer, much appreciated)

Tileset made by: Stealthix

(https://stealthix.itch.io/rpg-nature-tileset)

Disclaimer:

This game was made as a project for a game design and production class, where I experienced what it was like to make a game with a team of four people, where we worked with scrum.

Once the class was over, we barely continued with the game, so most likely there won't be any further updates or fixes in the future :(
